claimType.description: The type of loss claims whose order is to be amended.

listOfLossClaims.description: A list of the claims to be amended - all of the claims for a given type and tax year must be included in the submission.

id.description:
The unique identifier for the loss claim must conform to the regular expression: 
 ^[A-Za-z0-9]{15}$

sequence.description: The order number in which this loss claim is to be used it must be an integer from the range 1 to 99. The sequence can have no gaps and must begin with 1.
